sentences.simplifiedText: 他把纸夹在两本书中间。
sentences.traditionalText: 他把紙夾在兩本書中間。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bǎ zhǐ jiā zài liǎng běn shū zhōngjiān.
sentences.translation: He sandwiched the paper in between two books.

sentences.simplifiedText: 请在两片面包中夹一片火腿。
sentences.traditionalText: 請在兩片麵包中夾一片火腿。
sentences.pinyin: qǐng zài liǎng piàn miàn bāo zhōng jiā yī piàn huǒ tuǐ.
sentences.translation: Please sandwich a slice of ham between two pieces of bread.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了准备午餐，他先涂了一些黄油，然后在两片面包中夹了几片火腿和奶酪。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了準備午餐，他先塗了一些黃油，然後在兩片麵包中夾了幾片火腿和奶酪。
sentences.pinyin: wèi le zhǔn bèi wǔ cān，tā xiān tú le yī xiē huáng yóu，rán hòu zài liǎng piàn miàn bāo zhōng jiā le jǐ piàn huǒ tuǐ hé nǎi lào.
sentences.translation: To prepare lunch, he first spread some butter, and then sandwiched several slices of ham and cheese between two pieces of bread.

sentences.simplifiedText: 果汁被夹在两个杯子之间。
sentences.traditionalText: 果汁被夾在兩個杯子之間。
sentences.pinyin: guǒ zhī bèi jiā zài liǎng gè bēi zi zhī jiān.
sentences.translation: The juice is wedged between two cups.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我发现我的铅笔被夹在了书本和温度计之间，这让我感到非常意外。
sentences.traditionalText: 我發現我的鉛筆被夾在了書本和溫度計之間，這讓我感到非常意外。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ fā xiàn wǒ de qiān bǐ bèi jiā zài le shū běn hé wēn dù jì zhī jiān, zhè ràng wǒ gǎn dào fēi cháng yì wài.
sentences.translation: I found my pencil wedged between the book and the thermometer, which was very surprising to me.

sentences.pinyin: Tā de yǎnjiǎng jiāzá zhe xiàohuà.
sentences.translation: His speech was interspersed with jokes.

sentences.simplifiedText: 演讲者巧妙地夹杂了一些幽默的元素，使整个讲座充满了趣味。
sentences.traditionalText: 演講者巧妙地夾雜了一些幽默的元素，使整個講座充滿了趣味。
sentences.pinyin: Yǎnjiǎngzhě qiǎomiào dì jiāzále yīxiē yōumò de yuánsù, shǐ zhěnggè jiǎngzuò chōngmǎnle qùwèi.
sentences.translation: The speaker skillfully interspersed some humorous elements, making the whole lecture full of interest.

sentences.simplifiedText: 请把鸡肉和调料夹在一起。
sentences.traditionalText: 請把雞肉和調料夾在一起。
sentences.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ jīròu hé tiáoliào jiā zài yīqǐ.
sentences.translation: Please mix the chicken and the seasoning together.

sentences.simplifiedText: 这个美食的制作过程涉及把各种香料和肉夹在一起，然后慢热，使它们的风味能够混合。
sentences.traditionalText: 這個美食的製作過程涉及把各種香料和肉夾在一起，然後慢熱，使它們的風味能夠混合。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège měishí de zhìzuò guòchéng shèjí bǎ gè zhǒng xiāngliào hé ròu jiā zài yīqǐ, ránhòu màn rè, shǐ tāmen de fēngwèi nénggòu hùnhé.
sentences.translation: The making of this delicacy involves mingling various spices and meat, and then slow heating to allow their flavors to combine.

sentences.simplifiedText: 请把这个文件放在这个夹子里。
sentences.traditionalText: 請把這個檔案放在這個夾子裏。
sentences.pinyin: qǐng bǎ zhè ge dàng àn fàng zài zhè ge jiā zi lǐ
sentences.translation: Please put this file in this folder.

sentences.simplifiedText: 请按照日期和客户名称把文件正确地放进相应的夹子。
sentences.traditionalText: 請按照日期和客戶名稱把檔案正確地放進相應的夾子。
sentences.pinyin: qǐng àn zhào rì qī hé kè hù míng chēng bǎ dàng àn zhèng què dì fàng jìn xiāng yìng de jiā zi
sentences.translation: Please correctly place the files in the corresponding folders according to the date and the customer name.
